Posts.Content: i am 62 and was diagnosed with prostate cancer gleason 6 and went to see dr brooks in Stanford and go to meet dr carol in ucsf. dr brooks said that he can save the two nurves bundles but also said that because i have experienced lately weak sexual performance he think after surgery it will get worse .is that contradict each other saving the nurves bundles but still does not improve performance?.
Posts.Title: prostate cancer feedback from patient after treatment
